channel.title: Bruna Bites
channel.description: My name is Bruna Bites and I create modern digital experiences for humans using seo, content, design, and code.

item.title: Understanding Google Core Web Vitals: LCP, FID, and CLS
item.description: I recently discovered Railway, an app infrastructure platform. Setup a free PostgreSQL database to use in your next project.

item.title: Rebuilding My Blog with Next.js, TypeScript, and Contentlayer
item.description: I updated my Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS blog with a fresh coat of paint, new components, and Contentlayer for markdown.

item.title: From Wordpress to Jamstack: Why A Self-taught Dev Made the Switch
item.description: A couple years ago, I thought I was going to be a WordPress developer. Here's why I switched to the Jamstack instead.

item.description: I recently discovered Railway, an app infrastructure platform. Setup a free PostgreSQL database to use in your next project.

item.title: 2022 React/Next.js Developer Tech Stack and Tools
item.description: In 2022, I'm coding in TypeScript, building projects with React, spinning up databases with Railway, exploring Remix, and more.
